lifeQuotes.quote: Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
lifeQuotes.author: Alice Morse Earle

lifeQuotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
lifeQuotes.author: Dalai Lama

lifeQuotes.quote: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
lifeQuotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

lifeQuotes.quote: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.
lifeQuotes.author: Tony Robbins

lifeQuotes.quote: Life is change, growth is optional. Choose wisely.
lifeQuotes.author: Karen Kaiser Clark

lifeQuotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
lifeQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

lifeQuotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
lifeQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

lifeQuotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
lifeQuotes.author: Sam Levenson

lifeQuotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
lifeQuotes.author: C.S. Lewis
